sqlMap.select: SELECT PSI.STATUS_NO STATUS_NO, PSI.STATUS_ID STATUS_ID, PSI.STATUS_NAME STATUS_NAME, PSI.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, PSI.ACTIVITY ACTIVITY FROM PROCESS_STATUS_INFO PSI, HR_EMPLOYEE HE1, HR_EMPLOYEE HE2 WHERE PSI.CREATED_BY = HE1.EMPID(+) AND PSI.UPDATED_BY = HE2.EMPID(+) AND PSI.CPNY_ID = #metaData.company.companyId#
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM PROCESS_STATUS_INFO PSI, HR_EMPLOYEE HE1, HR_EMPLOYEE HE2 WHERE PSI.CREATED_BY = HE1.EMPID(+) AND PSI.UPDATED_BY = HE2.EMPID(+) AND PSI.CPNY_ID = #metaData.company.companyId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PROCESS_STATUS_INFO ( STATUS_NO, STATUS_ID, STATUS_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_DATE, CREATED_BY, ACTIVITY, CPNY_ID) VALUES( PROCESS_STATUS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'STATUS-'||PROCESS_STATUS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #name# , #description# , #metaData.createDate#, #metaData.createUser.adminID#, #active#, #metaData.company.companyId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROCESS_STATUS_INFO SET STATUS_NAME = #name#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, ACTIVITY = #active#, UPDATE_DATE = #metaData.lastUpdateDate#, UPDATED_BY = #metaData.lastUpdateUser.adminID# WHERE STATUS_NO = #no# AND CPNY_ID = #metaData.company.companyId#

UPDATE PROCESS_STATUS_INFO SET ACTIVITY = #active#, UPDATE_DATE = #metaData.lastUpdateDate#, UPDATED_BY = #metaData.lastUpdateUser.adminID# WHERE STATUS_NO = #no# AND CPNY_ID = #metaData.company.companyId#
